Class LoginActivity

public class LoginActivity
extends com.actionbarsherlock.app.SherlockActivity

This is the first activity the user comes in contact with. The user enters in a username and password to login. Although it is removed for now, new users can also register.

          Login task: Asynchronous task to make the web request and get the account object.

Constructor Detail

LoginActivity

public LoginActivity()
Method Detail

onCreate

protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
Initializes ui elements and listeners for user to login. Login is done asynchronously. If user has logged in before and session is still open(meaning user has not logged out and this is not new application install) ,then login is automatically done from information stored persistently in shared preferences.
